"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor - This iconic rock song would be the perfect opening track to set the tone for a motivational and inspiring soundtrack to life. It's all about pushing through challenges and never giving up, which is something we could all use a reminder of from time to time.

"Happy" by Pharrell Williams - This upbeat and catchy tune is all about finding joy in life's little moments, and I think it would be a great addition to any soundtrack. It's a reminder to appreciate the good times and not take life too seriously.

"Roar" by Katy Perry - This empowering anthem is all about finding your inner strength and roaring back to life. It's a great song to listen to when you're feeling down or unmotivated, and it's sure to get you pumped up and ready to take on the day.

"Here Comes the Sun" by The Beatles - This classic song is a beautiful and uplifting tune that always makes me think of brighter days ahead. It's a reminder that even when things are tough, the sun will always come out again, and there's always hope for a better tomorrow.

"Brave" by Sara Bareilles - This heartfelt ballad is all about being true to yourself and speaking your mind. It's a great song to listen to when you're feeling nervous or unsure of yourself, and it's sure to give you the courage to stand up for what you believe in.
